system.description: The character can interface directly with a vehicle through their Mind Impulse Unit, using their mental prowess to pilot with machine precision.
system.benefit: Character can link to a vehicle via their Mind Impulse Unit, and in so doing be able to use their Intelligence Characteristic in place of Agility for Operate(Surface, Aeronautica, and Voidship) Tests. Whenever a vehicle suffers Critical damage whilst the character is linked in this way, they gain 1 Fatigue from the associated mental strain.
system.notes: Requires Architectus Magna Advanced Specialty and Mind Impulse Unit

specialAbilities.name: Mind Impulse Vehicle Link
specialAbilities.description: When linked to a vehicle via Mind Impulse Unit, use Intelligence instead of Agility for Operate Tests. Gain 1 Fatigue when the linked vehicle suffers Critical damage.
